Perf

Perf

new Perf(selector)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
selector Object

Perf extends an existing selector engine prototype. For Moovweb Optimize, we use our modified version of Cheerio.
Source:
  • moov_perf.js, line 15

Methods

(static) selector#optimizeImg(options) → {Object}

Rewrites image source tags to point to the Moovweb Image Optimizer.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object.<string, Object>

options of attributes
Source:
  • moov_perf.js, line 72
Returns:

selector engine(i.e. moov_cheerio)

Type
Object
Example
<p>let html = &quot;<img src="http://www.moovweb.com/selfie.jpg"></img>&quot;&quot;
let $ = cheerio.load(html);
let args = {
    height: 666,
    width: 777,
    quality: 88,
    format: 'webp'
};
let imgs = $('img').optimizeImg(args);
console.log(imgs[0].attribs.src)
=&gt; &quot;//opt.moovweb.net/img?img=http://www.moovweb.com/selfie.jpg&amp;linkEncoded=0&amp;width=777&amp;height=666&amp;preserve_aspect_ratio=1&amp;quality=88&amp;format=webp&quot;</p>

(static) selector#quality(quality) → {Object.<string, boolean>}

Apply the quality data attribute to a selection of nodes

Parameters:
Name Type Description
quality string

quality data
Source:
  • moov_perf.js, line 39
Returns:

selector engine(i.e. moov_cheerio)

Type
Object.<string, boolean>
Example
<p>const perf = new moov_perf(cheerio)
let $ = cheerio.load('<img src="/selfie.jpg"></img>');
$('img').quality('88');</p>

Returns:

Return true if domain is in the blacklist

Type
boolean

ignore(domain)

Add domain to the ignore list. When perf.selector selects an image tag, it will not rewrite the image source for any images included in the ignored list.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
domain string

domain string
Source:
  • moov_perf.js, line 273
Example
<p>perf.ignore('http://www.moovweb.com/')</p>

ignored() → {Object.<string, Object>}

Get blacklisted domains

Source:
  • moov_perf.js, line 261
Returns:

Return a map of all domains currently being ignored.

Type
Object.<string, Object>
Example
<p>perf.ignored()
=&gt; 'http://www.moovweb.com/'</p>
